name: Ortlieb Back-Roller Classic Panniers
description: These Ortlieb panniers are known for their durability and reliability. The waterproof fabric and roll-top closure keeps your gear dry on wet commutes and the inevitable rainy days that happen when you’re bike touring. They’re trusty companions for your rides.PVC-coated polyester and PU-coated nylon is completely waterproof.IP64 waterproof rating means these are perfect for rainy weather.QL2.1 fixing system for easy installation and removal from the bike rack. Adjustable to fit your bike rack.Fits racks with tubes 16, 12, 10 and 8mm in diameter.Shoulder strap for carrying comfort off the rack.3M Scotchlite reflective patches keep you visible.Edge protector prevent premature wear.Capacity is 20L per pannier. Max load is 9kg per pannier.Sold as a pair.
